# textItemTag

**Type Property**

The name of a custom tag associated with a text item.

## Declaration

```swift
static let textItemTag: NSAttributedString.Key
```

## Discussion

The value of this attribute is an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object with the tag name of a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UITextItem] object.

## Getting text attribute keys

- **cursor**: The cursor object.
- **link**: The link for the text.
- **markedClauseSegment**: The index of the marked clause segment.
- **replacementIndex**: The replacement position associated with a format string specifier.
- **shadow**: The shadow of the text.
- **spellingState**: The spelling state of the text.
- **suggestionHighlight**: A highlight associated with a Spotlight suggestion.
- **textAlternatives**: The alternatives for the text.
- **textEffect**: An attribute that applies a text effect to the text.
- **textHighlightColorScheme**: The custom highlight color to apply to the text.
- **textHighlightStyle**: An attribute that adds a highlight color to the text to emphasize it.
- **toolTip**: The tooltip text.
